resources.string:
SynWord is a game in which you have to find synonyms (words with a similar meaning). 

Each correct word will give you 5 points (there are two synonyms per round) which sum up to 100 points per game.

The button Play will get you to the gamemodes „Accuracy“ and „Speed“. 

In „Accuracy“ you can search fort he two synonyms without time pressure to gain the maximum points.

In „Speed“ you have 15 seconds to find the words per round, gaining fewer points for correct words if you’re slower.

In „Highscore“ you can see the top ten ranked by points in each gamemode.
Developed as internship in cooperation with econob GmBH
Mark two words with similar meaning to this given one
*There are 10 rounds to play.\n*You can choose 2 words out of 6 in each round.\n*There are 2 synonyms (words with similar meaning) among the 6 words, each right synonym will give you 5 points.

*There are 10 rounds to play.
*You can choose 2 words out of 6 in each round.
*There are 2 synonyms (words with similar meaning) among the 6 words, each right synonym will give you 5 points.
*After 3 seconds: 80% of points (4 or 8)
*After 6 seconds: 60% of points (3 or 6)
*After 9 seconds: 40% of points (2 or 4)
*After the 10th second: 10% of points (1 or 2)
*11-15 seconds: no points, round changes after 15 seconds
